item.description:
Join the Assabet Village Food Co-op at its first fundraising event! We are a group working to build a community-owned market that provides access to healthy, affordable local food in Maynard, MA, serving Acton, Stow, Sudbury, Concord and other surrounding towns.
LIVE MUSIC, LOCAL FOOD, COCKTAILS, DANCING, SILENT AUCTION & RAFFLE.
Also: if you are an artisan, crafter, trainer, provider of services or other goods and would like to support the co-op by donating an auction item, please contact us. It's a great opportunity to advertise to our supporters who are passionate about local food and local businesses. We have over 700 supporters who have asked to be on our mailing list, we expect 150 attendees at the party. http://assabetvillagecoop.com/; assabetvillagecoop@gmail.com

Tickets: $35 in advance/ $40 at the door.
Purchase online: http://assabetvillagecoop.eventbrite.com/
item.name: Assabet Village Food Co-op: Fundraiser cocktail party and silent auction
